attributes.action: Permit fireworks, including professional displays to be purchased and fired by any adult
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must stop the trend in the United Kingdom of outlawing everything that might be dangerous or disliked by some. Political correctness is turning our country into the laughing stock of the world. Are the lawmakers really normal or something out of the goon show or "yes Prime Minister". We need to be governed by individuals gifted with intelligence, wisdom, but above all common sense.
